title: Factorial
shortDescription: Write a function that calculates factorial.
description: Write a function that calculates factorial. 5 factorial is, for example, 5*4*3*2*1.

title: FizzBuzz
description: Write a program that prints numbers 1 through 100 on seperate lines, but for multiples of 3 instead print "Fizz", for multiples of 5 print "Buzz", and for multiples of both print "FizzBuzz". For example, 2 would be printed, 6 would print "Fizz", 10 would print "Buzz", and 15 would print "FizzBuzz". Note: your output IS case sensitive, and each number's output MUST be on a seperate line. If you're stuck keep in mind the first thing your program should output is a 1 and the last thing your code should output is a line break.
